attributes.action: Allow Randolph Simmonette (Jnr) to continue living at 1 Melton Avenue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my nana & granda lived at no.1 melton avenue in walker, newcastle for the last 41 years. thus seeing 4 generations raised in this house.over the past 4 years my uncle has been a live in carer for my nana,and since my nana passed away we would like to keep this house in the simmonette family

rejection.details: Please contact http://www.communities.gov.uk/housing to discuss your situation.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
